songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dekhdina ma bhagya rekha kalila yi haat ma
Chadigayau eklai yaha tadpiyela timro aatma
Timro aakha ma basne they ramne they ma timro kaakhma
Tara dhanna mero karma marma matra rahechha mero bhaagma
Saathma rakhenau kina haath yo thamenau kina
Anaath nai sacheko thiyau tara royena man kina janma dida
Man kina khadal ma puryau, eh aama ma nirdos lai
Roko hoen ma timro nimti tara udaunu chha mero bhok lai
Pyaas lai khedaunu chha, lakshya haru bhetaunu chha
Timro mero sambandha ko astitva ni metaunu chha
Tapani jwalamukhi phute jhai polchha man taato raap le
Jiudo laash sari bhayechu ma timro ragat ko shraap le

[Chorus]
Timi pani manche hau, ma pani manche hun
Tyesaile halka maryada na birsi manche ko
Mero tah jindagi aba yettikai jane bho
Aakha chimli charge khaye kaal le kaile lane ho

[Verse 2]
Foothpath mero ghar, tara bhote sano chha
Haath ko sirani ma mitho nindra lagdacha
Na ta meri aama chhin, na ta mero aama chha
Kukur mera sathi huun, sadhai mero saath chhan
Hepiyeko maanav hun, khate mero naam chha
Faaliyeko fohor hun, saadak hidne kaam chha
Pet paalchhu jhuto le fohor bhitra khojera
Karma mero khoto chha kaha pauchhu rojera
Karma mero abhagi, lakshya mero harayo
Kasai ko aas gardai thye, khate bhani karayo
Aba kaha jaau ma, feri kasko haat samauna
Afnai le tah chhadidiye aru sanga kasto nata lau mah

[Chorus] x2
Timi pani manche hau, ma pani manche hun
Tyesaile halka maryada na birsi manche ko
Mero tah jindagi aba yettikai jane bho
Aakha chimli charge khaye kaal le kaile lane ho

[Outro]
Ah....
songs.title: Foothpath Mero Ghar
